scenarios.name: Hidden Drug Interaction Chain
scenarios.description: Find patients at risk for heart surgery complications due to undiscovered medication interactions. Requires: Surgery→PreOp_Medication→INTERACTS_WITH→Patient_Medication→Patient path
scenarios.query: Which patients scheduled for cardiac procedures have medications that interact with standard pre-op drugs

scenarios.name: Transitive Infection Exposure Risk
scenarios.description: Find patients potentially exposed to infectious diseases through shared healthcare providers. Requires traversing: Patient→TREATED_BY→Doctor→TREATED_BY→InfectedPatient→HAS_CONDITION→InfectiousDisease
scenarios.query: Identify patients who share doctors with patients diagnosed with communicable diseases

scenarios.name: Polypharmacy Cascade Risk
scenarios.description: Find elderly patients at high fall risk due to multiple medication side effects combined with bone conditions. Requires aggregating: Patient→PRESCRIBED→Meds→CAUSES_SIDE_EFFECT→[Dizziness,Drowsiness] AND Patient→HAS_CONDITION→Osteoporosis
scenarios.query: Which senior patients on multiple medications are at elevated fall risk due to combined drug side effects

scenarios.name: Treatment Protocol Gap Detection
scenarios.description: Find patients with conditions who are NOT receiving standard-of-care medications. Requires: Condition→STANDARD_TREATMENT→Medication comparison with Patient→PRESCRIBED→Medications
scenarios.query: Identify patients with diabetes who are missing recommended first-line treatment medications

scenarios.name: Cross-Specialty Contraindication
scenarios.description: Find patients whose medications from different specialists are contraindicated with each other. Requires: Patient→TREATED_BY→Doctor[specialty=A]→PRESCRIBED→Med1 CROSS Patient→TREATED_BY→Doctor[specialty=B]→PRESCRIBED→Med2 WHERE Med1→CONTRAINDICATED→Med2
scenarios.query: Which patients have potentially dangerous drug combinations from different specialist prescriptions
